resource_explanation:
El Plano user's events API(event created by user).

Event attributes :

 - `title` - Represents event name.
 - `description` - Represents event detailed description.
 - `status` - Represents event current status.
   - `confirmed` - The event is confirmed. This is the default status.
   - `tentative` - The event is tentatively confirmed.
   - `cancelled` - The event is cancelled (deleted).

 - `recurrence` - Represents recurrence rules.
 - `timezone` - Timezone settings.
 - `start_at` - Represents when event starts.
 - `end_at` - Represents when event ends.
 - `timestamps`

 Also, includes reference to the event creator and attached course.

parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: The course to which the event is attached. Included in "relationships" category

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Officia nihil quaerat.","description":"Distinctio omnis nihil. Qui reprehenderit aliquam. Quos impedit mollitia. Qui possimus cum. Sed dolores eveniet.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-06","end_at":"2019-08-08","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":1,"type":"course"}}}}}

request_headers.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Deserunt enim delectus.","description":"Et molestias incidunt. Vero molestiae cum. Aut nulla sit. Aliquid aut quaerat. Consectetur eligendi sunt.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-06","end_at":"2019-08-08","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":1,"type":"course"}}}}}

curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Officia nihil quaerat.","description":"Distinctio omnis nihil. Qui reprehenderit aliquam. Quos impedit mollitia. Qui possimus cum. Sed dolores eveniet.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-08-06","end_at":"2019-08-08","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]},"relationships":{"course":{"data":{"id":1,"type":"course"}}}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 8c77677d1be9d2af5a939fc173664b4d963949d429bbc80d93a6860fa6361438" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
	-H "Cookie: "
